channel.title: Can SCAR get you IP banned?
channel.description: I might start using scripts again but want to make sure its not a risk to my main, sorry if its the wrong section. I figured it was a question so its in questions section.

item.title: Can SCAR get you IP banned?
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

you might if they catch you alot of times. getting baned with scar is hard if u macro properly.

Read full topic
item.source: Can SCAR get you IP banned?

item.title: Can SCAR get you IP banned?
item.dc:creator: @Schizzo Schizzo
item.description:
@Schizzo wrote:

Fagex (Jagex) claims that they’ve been “cracking down” on people macroing but I don’t believe it. They last time I played the game a few months ago, macroers were everywhere. If you get caught, you’ll definitely get banned, but I don’t think you’ll get IP banned.

Read full topic
item.source: Can SCAR get you IP banned?
